DOC.brief_summary: A pilot study conduct develop study menus similar appearance , aroma , taste .
DOC.detailed_description: The aim pilot study test difference palatability rating four menu administer ENERGY I project . During pilot study , palatability rating collect meal ( breakfast , lunch , dinner ) four different menu serve participant main ENERGY I trial . The menu consist three diet vary dietary fat energy density : 1 ) high fat/high energy density , 2 ) high fat/low energy density , 3 ) high carbohydrate/low energy density . In addition three menu , menu baseline period trial also test palatability .
DOC.criteria: You age 18 50 , inclusive , male age 18 45 , inclusive , female . body mass index ( BMI ) 25 30 kg/m2 , inclusive For female , regular menstrual period , less 28 day cycle . chronic disease affect body weight , appetite , metabolism , diabetes cardiovascular disease . You use prescription overthecounter medication herbal product affect metabolism body weight ( e.g . weight loss medication sibutramine , orlistat ) .
